entry.title: SmartColor Protecting Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Conditioner
Price: 36.00

This revolutionary conditioner is formulated for supreme color vibrancy, hydration and healing since color (and lightening) is stressful on your strands.

The innovative blend of essential fatty and amino acids is delivered deep into every strand to increase color retention for extended peak color life, eliminating breakage and frizz, and restoring every strand to optimal health with soft, smooth texture, sublime hydration for bounce and movement, and gorgeous shine.

Enjoy the light, clean, and divinely delicious, soft scent of grapefruit plus luscious floral undertones. A sensual love affair awaits.

• Vegan & gluten free

• Silicone free, Sulfate free, paraben free, panthenol free, phthalate/musk free, petroleum/mineral oil free

• Never tested on animals

• Made in the USA

• 8.5 fl oz | 250 ml

Ingredients

Water, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine†, Dicapryl Succinate†, Brassica Glycerides†, Soy Amino Acids†, Palm Oil*, Aleurites Moluccana (Kiwi) Seed Oil†, Molasses†, Castor Oil*, Lecithin*, Sunflower Oil*, Soy*, Safflower Oil*, Vitamin C, Wild Pansy Extract†, Sweet Clover Extract, Apricot Extract†, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract†, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract†, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract†, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract†, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract†, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil†, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract†, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Fruit Extract†, Nasturtium Extract†, Nectarine Extract†, Passion Flower Extract†, Parfumº, Dehydroacetic Acid*, Benzyl Alcohol*

*ECOCERT Certified Ingredient †Natural Ingredient ‡Plant Derived/Organically Derived °Phthalate free/Musk free

Directions

After cleansing with SmartColor Shampoo, apply to wet hair, rinse. For more intensive hydration, apply with wide-tooth comb and leave in for up to five minutes, then rinse. Follow with SmartStart or SmartVolume Leave-in Conditioner.

Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Hair Styling
Price: 59.00

A truly magical potion for curl gorgeousness! The first silicone-free product of its kind with properties that will amaze - soft, touchable curls with brilliant shine, weightless and leaves no residue. It's a wow product that you simply won't be able to live without!

• Defines curls without stickiness or crunch

• Softens + adds shine while moisturizing dry strands

• Paraben, silicone, fragrance, & gluten free

Directions

Initially apply 1 pump to wet or dry hair, roots to ends. Then adjust number of pumps according to length of hair and definition required. Shape using fingers into desired curl or wave pattern. For optimal results, apply SmartStart or SmartVolume Leave-in Conditioner just before using WonderBalm.

Directions

entry.title: Volume Discovery Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Travel Kit
Price: 34.00

A simple and easy all-natural system for stunning volume, that's soft to the touch and with brilliant shine!

Discovery Kit Includes:

• UltraShine Moisture Shampoo (2 oz)

• UltraShine Moisture Conditioner (2 oz)

• SmartVolume Volumizing Leave-In Conditioner (2 oz)

• TotalControl Styling Creme (2 oz)

• Reusable recyclable Zip Pouch + Instruction Card

All EVOLVh products are sulfate, paraben and sodium chloride (salt) free. They are also vegan, contain no animal products, and are never tested on animals.

Ingredients

Please refer to individual product pages for detailed ingredient information!

Directions

(1) Cleanse and treat with UltraShine Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner. (2) Spray towel dried damp hair with SmartVolume, approximately 10-12 spray pumps roots to ends, more product at root for extra lift. (3) Blow-dry hair away from scalp either with a round brush or simply using gravity by hanging head upside down while blow-drying. (4) When hair is 50% dry, apply TotalControl Styling Creme, root to ends, more product at root for extra lift. Use nickel sized amount from root to mid-shaft, dime sized amount from mid-shaft to ends. (5) Finish blow-drying hair away from scalp. And voila! Stunning beautiful Volume.

Additional Go Big Tips

Volume created using SmartVolume & TotalControl should last into Day 2 and often even Day 3. When flat-ironing for a pin-straight look, apply SmartVolume or SmartStart & TotalControl prior to blow-drying for heat protection and to help hair stay smooth, straight, super shiny and with lots of movement. EVOLVh products are magic anytime you're using a hot iron!

entry.title: SuperFinish Polishing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Hair Styling
Price: 12.00 - 32.00 (2 variants)

Many stylists call SuperFinish the perfect product. It delivers brilliant shine, de-frizzing and fly-away control, plus it moisturizes and protects without being greasy or adding weight - making it an incredible alternative to oils.

• Moisture for dry ends + heat protection for heat styling

Ingredients

Water, pHytoBlend (proprietary concentrate blend of 20 herbs in an aqueous base), hydrolyzed silk, soy bran lipids, jojoba oil, passion flower, Vit E crystals, cyclomethicone, cyclopentasiloxane, corn starch, ambrosia, citrus seed extract.

Directions

Apply to damp hair when air drying. You can also use it too dry hair after blow-drying and/or flat ironing to smooth and polish for a sleek look. You'll have hair with brilliant shine and without frizz or pesky fly-aways.

entry.title: UltraRepair Masque
entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Hair Treatment
Price: 16.00 - 127.00 (3 variants)

An intensive treatment for hair that has been compromised by color or bleach processing, heat styling, or environmental factors. Highly effective for smoothing coarse, curly or frizz-prone hair, it leaves hair bouncy, more elastic (less prone to breakage and split ends), shiny and silky no matter its previous condition.

Most other 'deep conditioners' and hair 'masques' act mainly on the surface of the hair, but UltraRepair penetrates deep into hair, which is a must for real, transformational repair and strengthening to occur. Hair doesn't heal overnight, so repeating the masque at regular intervals, as well using EVOLVh UltraShine Shampoo and UltraShine Conditioner between masque treatments, will yield significant long-term benefits.

All EVOLVh products are sulfate, paraben and sodium chloride (salt) free. They are also vegan, contain no animal products, and are never tested on animals.

Ingredients

Water, pHytoBlend (proprietary concentrate blend of 20 herbs in an aqueous base) stearylkonium chloride, silk amino acids, glyceryl monostearate, palm oil, mango, lecithin, sunflower oil, soya, safflower oil, soy amino acids, vitamin C, wild pansy, sweet clover, apricot, nasturturm, nectarine, passion flower, citrus seed extract.

Directions

Shampoo with EVOLVh UltraShine Moisture Shampoo, rinse and towel dry hair lightly until hair is damp. Proceed to apply UltraRepair until hair is modestly saturated (thin layer of saturation) and comb through with wide tooth comb for even distribution. Bag hair (shower cap style baggie) and wait 15 minutes before rinsing. After rinsing, towel dry hair and apply your favorite EVOLVh styling product or StartSmart Leave-in Conditioner Spray for heat protection and other benefits, then style as desired (air dry or style with heat/blow-dry).

Use UltraRepair Masque weekly, monthly or as-needed. One 8.5 oz bottle contains 8-24 applications (2-6 months of weekly use, depending on hair length and thickness). Average use per application is 0.75 oz.

entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Shampoo
Price: 8.00 - 72.00 (3 variants)

Color safe and great for all hair types, this shampoo is beloved by discerning stylists. It balances hair’s pH level in order to leave it strong and silky, contains ingredients such as seaweed extract, mango, and apricot to deliver crucial nutrients to thirsty strands, and allows amino and fatty acids to restore hair from the inside out, providing anti-aging benefits.

Directions
